alert.note: Alert for Allen; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:04PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Logan, northern Simpson, west central Allen and southwestern Warren Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 1004 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Memphis Junction, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Warren, east central Logan, northern Simpson and west central Allen Counties, including the following locations... Hillsdale, Rich Pond, South Union, Woodburn, Matlock, Trammel, Salmons, Boyce, Mount Aerial and Petros. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
